Current Projects

I currently support the accessibility platform team at a large retailer based in the Pacific Northwest. I also teach a course at Iowa State University on Search Engine Optimization (SEO). When time allows, I like to share my knowledge and contribute to The A11y Project.

When I'm not working, you'll find me writing, giving talks, tinkering with code, and getting outside.

Articles

I often write down my thoughts about remote work, accessibility, SEO, and software engineering. My most recent article was filled with actionable insights you can use to convince your business to invest in accessibility.

Talks

I've spoken at several events about technical SEO, digital accessibility, content marketing, and digital marketing. Recently, I had the great pleasure of co-hosting a webinar on Accessibility Strategies for Retail Organizations with Deque

If you'd like to hire me for your event, please check out my speaker rider first.
